name: 林震
objective: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。運動方程式、一維振動（自由及強制）、振動量測、二維振動、多維振動及機械應用說明。
schedule:
週次	單元主題
1	Introduction
2	One DOF Free Vibration
3	One DOF Free Vibration
4	One DOF Free Vibration
5	One DOF Harmonic Vibration
6	One DOF Harmonic Vibration
7	One DOF Non-Harmonic Vibration
8	One DOF Non-Harmonic Vibration
9	Midterm Exam.
10	Two DOF Vibration
11	Two DOF Vibration
12	Continuous System Vibration Analysis
13 	Continuous System Vibration Analysis
14	ANSYS Dynamic System Analysis
15	ANSYS Dynamic System Analysis
16	ANSYS Dynamic System Analysis
17	ANSYS Dynamic System Analysis
18	Final
materials: 振動學 蕭庭郎  高立圖書
